pr_title: HBASE-23694 After RegionProcedureStore completes migration of WALProcedureStore, …

timeline.message: After RegionProcedureStore completes migration of WALProcedureStore, still running WALProcedureStore.syncThread keeps trying to delete now inexistent log files.

timeline.bodyText: Why an abort and  not non-abort here? Should this be in finally block? I closed my dupe of this over in HBASE-23696
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText:
Do not need to be in finally block. If there are errors we just fail the start up of HMaster. If we pass abort = false then it will try to append a trailer which will cause teh stop to hang there.
Of course, a better way maybe call store.stop(false) before we delete the proc wal directory, but not a big deal?
replies.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText: Ok. Good enough for now. Thanks.
replies.author: saintstack
